product_name: RockShox Reba RL Suspension Fork - Tapered Steerer - 100mm Travel - 29" Wheel Size
long_description: Offering consistent suspension for your 29er, the RockShox Reba RL fork supplies 100mm of tuneable, easily serviceable travel to dependably smooth out the trails ahead.
short_description: Offering consistent suspension for your 29er, the RockShox Reba RL fork supplies 100mm of tuneable, easily serviceable travel to dependably smooth out the trails ahead.
